title: So if the Kalista numbers on LoL Wiki are accurate that's insane, Also Nidalee spears all over again
body:
Q: 240 base damage with 100% total ad scaling on an 8 second cooldown. (basically the Jinx problem all over again, just wanna point that out, or AP nidalee.)

W: 20% of the Targets Maximum Health on her 

E: 80 base damage with 60% AD scaling with 40% damage per additional spear

Each of these is rank 5. Each of these is insanely high by themselves, why so much one on kit that already auto Orb-Walks for you.
